articles.title: Climate change induced by human activity behind floods in Nigeria - Africanews English
articles.description: This years' floods in Nigeria were 80 times more likelier to occur because of human activity, according to scientists
articles.content:
Climate change was the main cause of the floods that killed over 600 people in Nigeria this year, according to scientists.

articles.description: Proposed new laws come down hard on anyone smoking near children – or companies that sell sweets that look like cigarettes.
articles.content:
